messages:
Name: Burak Yilmaz
Nationality: Türkiye
Date of Birth: July 15, 1985
Position: Attacker
Current club: Fortuna Sittard
Eredivisie clubs played for: Fortuna Sittard
Burak Yilmaz is a Fortuna Sittard attacker who wasn't involved in any of the seven Eredivisie games that his club have played so far in 2023/2024.
The last time that Yilmaz featured in the league came on April 9, 2023 for Fortuna Sittard against Ajax; a match that he played 79 minutes in during a 4-0 defeat.
Fortuna Sittard occupy ninth in the standings with nine points and next face a home fixture against Twente in Eredivisie action on October 8.
In last season's Eredivisie, Yilmaz played in 26 games for Fortuna Sittard, scored nine goals and provided four assists.
Before linking up with Fortuna Sittard in June 2022, Yilmaz made 59 league appearances in total at Lille, scoring 20 goals and providing eight assists.
